articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Over 40% of Americans now see China as an enemy, a five-year high, a Pew report finds - NBC News
articles.description: More than 40% of Americans now label China as an enemy, up from a quarter two years ago and reaching the highest level in five years, according to an annual Pew Research Center survey released Wednesday.
